TopicTitle: How to tell whether physics/vessel has changed?

Articles.Content: I have a MonoBehavior subclass.  I take the difference in ActiveVessel's angularMomentum between successive calls to FixedUpdate(), to see how much torque was applied over the last timestep.  This all works well, except when I revert flight, switch vessels, etc.  How can I tell whether I'm in the first call to FixedUpdate() after such a change?

You need to subscribe to the onVesselGoOffRails / onVesselGoOnRails events. They should cover all you needs.

Diazo post has the info on how to do it (section 7). Here is the list of all GameEvents
